name: CLP_OCCUR_DATA
description: This table extracts the occurrence codes and occurrence dates for each claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the claim print record.

columns.name: OCCURRENCE_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The occurrence code category list for an institutional claim.

columns.name: OCCURRENCE_DT
columns.description: Stores Occurrence Date to print on institutional claims
